circumstances: The pilot departed San Juan-Isla Grande Airport with deficiencies with the radio navigation equipment. En route, he lost his orientation and became lost. He ditched the plane in the Atlantic Ocean and was quickly rescued by the crew of a ship. The aircraft sank and was lost.
probable_cause:
The pilot attempted operation with known deficiencies in equipment. The following factors were reported: 
- Improper in-flight decisions or planning, 
- Pilot knew that the radio navigation equipment was malfunctioning.
